answers.answer: HiStem Cell treatment is experimental, not proven cure either.  Hang in there.
I thought this was so interesting, take a look! http://hsci.harvard.edu/news/stem-cells-billions-human-insulin-producing-cells

question: I am interested about this new and interesting therapy. I am tired of shots!
title: Does anyone have any experience with stem cell therapy to treat type 1 diabetes?
